Market Research.description: Claim that the company has a strong track record in the field of marketing and sales.
Claim: I want to know what the market is doing with the products I use.
Claim that the company has a market research team that is responsible for conducting market research and analyzing market trends and comp....
Conduct a detailed market research analysis including competitor analysis and target market segmentation."

Sales.description: Train sales team on product knowledge
Implement a CRM system for lead management
Implement a new sales training program for the team.
Set up monthly sales performance review meetings.
Research and implement a new CRM software for lead management.

Marketing Strategy.description:
- Requirement 1 for Marketing Strategy-
        Description: Develop a comprehensive marketing plan including market analysis, target audience identification, and budget allocation.
        Due date: 1st December 2021

- Requirement 2 for Marketing Strategy-
        Description: Create engaging content for social media channels to increase brand visibility and engagement.
        Due date: 15th November 2021

- Requirement 3 for Marketing Strategy-
        Description: Implement email marketing campaigns to target potential customers and boost conversion rates.
        Due date: 20th November 2021
